summary: JOSH SHAPIRO - PRESIDENT (OR VICE PRESIDENT) - Josh Shapiro is a popular politician in a key battleground state – Pennsylvania. By securing Josh Shapiro on the ticket as President – or Vice President – the Democrats can significantly improve their chances of defeating Trump in the general election. Shapiro has also been extremely effective at coalition building, even winning the election to become Attorney General in 2016 – the year that Trump came into power! Josh Shapiro is a reliable, popular, and intelligent pick – and he brings the critical battleground state of Pennsylvania. Whether he is the Democratic Nominee for President, or the Vice President pick for whoever else may replace Biden, owning Josh Shapiro token is a wise bet!
